attributes.action: Stop people getting Convertibles on mobility scheme
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to review the mobility scheme and remove the choice of Convertible cars from the scheme

The following car choices need to be removed from the scheme

Mazda MX5, Fiat 500C, Mini Roadster, Smart for two, Vauxhall Cascada

If you are disabled you don’t need a convertible as they are not practical, how can a low to the ground car be practical?

Why should us the tax payers pay for people to drive around in brand new convertibles?

Sign this petition
